import styles from '../styles/Home.module.css' import { useLanguage, useLanguageUpdate } from '../context/siteLanguageContext' //context import { Row, Col, Card, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Header } from '../components/layout/Header' import { Navigation } from '../components/layout/Navbar' import { EmailForm } from '../components/form/EmailForm' import { Footer } from '../components/layout/Footer' const contatti = function () { const siteLanguage = useLanguage() //context return (
{/* Navbar */} {/* Page Content */}
{siteLanguage === "ita" ? "Contatti" : "Contacts"}
{siteLanguage === "ita" ? "Indirizzo" : "Address"}: Via Fregene 33 - 00183 {siteLanguage === "ita" ? "Roma" : "Rome"} (RM)
{siteLanguage === "ita" ? "Telefono" : "Phone Numbers"} 335-236564
Email: mastrogae@gmail.com
{siteLanguage === "ita" ? "Partita IVA" : "VAT number"}: 00000000000
{siteLanguage === "ita" ? "Aggiornato al" : "Last updated"}: 19/01/2020
{/* Footer */} < Footer />
) } export default contatti
